name: Robocop 4
overview: Unofficial fan-made sequel to ROBOCOP 3, written using AMOS. Tonight's headlines on Mediabreak... Reports that after ten years as a museum piece, the first cyborg law enforcement unit "ROBOCOP" mysteriously came back on-line and broke free from it's preserving case. It is now roaming the corridors of the Delta City museum. In related news, Omni Consumer Products current line of robot cops are today still executing offenders for minor offenses. An OCP spokesman had this to say - "We are aware of the glitch and hope to have all Law Enforcement Droids programming thoroughly checked in a few weeks time.
